body:
# State of the Repo Report, March 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics Ã¢ÂÂ enjoy! Ã°ÂÂ¤Â

The "median open pull request" adds 43 lines, removes 12 lines and touches 3 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 44 820 lines, removes 15 885 lines and touches 1 599 distinct files.

The repo contains 481 913 lines of text and 1 685 files.

There are currently 267 open pull requests from in total 81 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 6 percent.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, February 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15488)
